title: Rhema Care Integrated Development Centre
subtitle: Everyone deserves a home. Every country, every sector, every person has a role to play to make sure that no one is left behind. title: World Food Program USA
subtitle: .@WFP is on the front lines saving lives in #Syria, bringing food aid  to 4.8 million people inside the country every month and helping another 2.5 million Syrian #refugees in Egypt, Iraq, Jordan, Lebanon and Turkey. pic.twitter.com/YGdYD5Mvoq

title: UNHCR Lebanon
subtitle:
Many #refugees are spending their 9th winter in 
Winter usually means more expenses to cover heating, clothing & healthcare
#UNHCR ’s winter assistance program provides assistance to thousands of refugee families to help them face harsh weather conditions.
#TogetherWeGiveWarmthpic.twitter.com/vRu2NHsteF

title: Devendra Narain
subtitle:
India can’t take care of all the #refugees. 

Our first responsibility is to Hindus, Sikhs, Jains & others who could not come to India after partition but later Pak & B'desh started throwing them out because of their religion. No country other than India will accept them. pic.twitter.com/gSnJtK9CUn

title: Little Rock & Central AR
subtitle:
